webscript.shortname: Set Comment for Derived File Assoc
webscript.description: Applies the wc:derivations aspect and its wc:derivationsComments to a study file. To test: curl -v -u admin:admin "http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/wwarn/setDerivedAssocComment?studyFileNodeRef=workspace://SpacesStore/48e0d368-a90d-4692-8c48-8765a80678c0&comment=some comment"
